jobs.title: Lead Full-Stack Developer
jobs.job-description:
We’re looking for a Lead Full-Stack Developer who thrives at the intersection of architecture, scalability, and product innovation. You’ll play a key role in designing and developing our next-generation SaaS platform — driving the end-to-end technical strategy across frontend, backend, and data systems.

You’ll lead engineering efforts that power seamless user experiences, data-driven insights, and high-performance APIs — while mentoring a growing team of developers. This role is ideal for someone passionate about building robust, extensible systems using modern web technologies like React, Node.js, GraphQL, PostgreSQL, and cloud-native architectures.

What You’ll Do

Architect and implement full-stack systems powering our SaaS product — from frontend interfaces to backend services and API ecosystems.

Design scalable infrastructure for multi-tenant SaaS applications, focusing on performance, security, and data integrity.

Lead technical design discussions and guide decisions around architecture, integrations, and platform evolution.

Develop and maintain APIs and SDKs that enable integrations with third-party platforms, analytics tools, and client applications.

Work with product and design teams to translate business needs into technical solutions that deliver measurable impact.

Implement GraphQL schemas and resolvers to power modern, flexible data delivery to the frontend.

Oversee database design and optimization in PostgreSQL, ensuring data consistency, scalability, and efficient querying.

Mentor and guide junior engineers, fostering best practices in code quality, testing, and CI/CD automation.

Drive system observability and performance monitoring using modern DevOps and cloud tools.

Collaborate cross-functionally with product managers, designers, and data engineers to deliver new product features with technical excellence and operational reliability.

We’re Looking for Someone Who:

Has 7+ years of full-stack development experience, with at least 2 years in a technical leadership or senior developer role.

Possesses strong technical depth in modern web technologies — including React, Node.js (Express or NestJS), GraphQL, and PostgreSQL.

Demonstrates experience architecting scalable SaaS platforms or cloud-based enterprise systems.

Is fluent in API design, SDK development, and third-party integrations with an emphasis on maintainability and security.

Understands microservices, REST/GraphQL design patterns, and has a strong foundation in distributed systems.

Brings a solid grasp of frontend engineering principles — including state management, performance optimization, and component-driven design.

Is comfortable setting up and maintaining DevOps pipelines, CI/CD workflows, and cloud deployments (AWS, GCP, or Azure).

Communicates clearly and effectively with both technical and non-technical stakeholders, and can make architecture decisions that align with product goals.

Values clean code, maintainability, documentation, and team empowerment as part of engineering excellence.

It’s a Plus If You:

Have led SaaS platform development from concept to launch in a startup or product-led company.

Have experience working with containerized environments (Docker, Kubernetes) or serverless frameworks.

Have implemented authentication and authorization systems (OAuth, JWT, SSO) for B2B/B2C SaaS applications.

Have familiarity with data analytics pipelines, event tracking systems, or integration with BI tools.

Have built developer-facing SDKs or APIs for platform extensibility.

Have hands-on experience with performance tuning, caching layers (Redis, Varnish), and asynchronous job queues.

Thrive in a fast-paced, agile environment where innovation and ownership are key.

Why Join Us

Shape the core architecture of a cutting-edge SaaS platform.

Work alongside talented engineers, product thinkers, and growth leaders.

Contribute to an engineering culture that values innovation, autonomy, and collaboration.

Competitive compensation, growth opportunities, and a focus on long-term technical excellence.
